    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(peersim.core.Node n)
        Takes random samples with replacement from the nodes of the overlay network. No loop edges are added.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface peersim.dynamics.NodeInitializer
        Parameters:

      • distance

        private static double distance(peersim.core.Node new_node,
                               peersim.core.Node old_node,
                               int coordPid)
        Utility function: returns the Euclidean distance based on the x,y coordinates of a node. A RuntimeException is raised if a not initialized coordinate is found.
        Parameters:
        new_node - the node to insert in the topology.
        old_node - a node already part of the topology.
        coordPid - identifier index.
        Returns:
        the distance value.
